alert.note: Alert for Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 2:19PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Palm Beach County through 300 PM EDT... At 219 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a funnel cloud 7 miles northeast of Canal Point, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Funnel clouds and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Palm Beach, Boynton Beach, Wellington, Palm Beach Gardens, Pahokee, Ocean Ridge, Canal Point, Greenacres, Royal Palm Beach, Atlantis, Golden Lakes, Loxahatchee Groves, Lion Country Safari Park, The Acreage, Loxahatchee NWR, Aberdeen, Aberdeen Golf Course, Florida Gardens, Seminole Manor and Lake Worth Corridor. FUNNEL CLOUD...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Funnel clouds occasionally touch down and produce tornadoes or waterspouts. Move indoors and stay away from windows.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Palm Beach County; Inland Palm Beach County; Metro Palm Beach County
